DOC.brief_summary: Background : Dyskinesia refer major manifestation affect muscle performance neuromuscular control scapular stabilizer . Alterations around scapula muscular imbalance could facilitate emphasize dysfunction surround structure compressive shear stress create abnormal pull attachment . No study investigate effect scapular mobilization movement neck mobility pain . Objective : To quantify effect utilize scapular mobilization movement cervical pain range motion compare conventional treatment presence scapular dyskinesia . Design : experimental case-control study . Setting : Dammam Medical Complex . Methods : thirty-four patient chronic non-specific neck pain . Participants allocate one two group : experimental group treatment involve conventional manual intervention control group treatment consist conventional approach . The manual intervention consist sustain corrective scapular glide neck movement direction . Measurements include : Visual Analog Scale , pressure pain threshold , neck range motion , scapular rotation measure Neck Disability Index . Statistical analysis : do use SPSS version 22.0 Mac . Means standard deviation give descriptive statistic . Paired t-test used study effect scapulothoracic mobilization exercise neck range motion pain intensity . Independent t-test use compare effect two intervention pain intensity Key word : Pressure pain threshold ; Scapula ; Intervention , Manual therapy , mobilization .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Scapulothoracic Mobilization Cervical Pain Range Motion Patients With Neck Pain Scapular Dyskinesia
DOC.detailed_description: Participants : Males female age 25 50 year refer orthopedic clinic chronic neck pain include study . Recruitment extend time period extend April 2016- April 2017 ) notice orthopedics department measure inclusion exclusion . Data collect Dammam Medical Complex . Sample : 34 participant non-specific chronic neck pain ( â‰¥ 3 month ) Procedures : Patients screen eligibility inclusion exclusion criterion . Consent form discuss thoroughly researcher patient sign start study . Assessment include follow : Detailed subjective information , data collection sheet demographic data ( e.g. , name , age , sex side scapular dyskinesia ) ( Appendix 5 ) . Dyskinesia identify use Scapular Dyskinesis Test 5 repetition active shoulder flexion abduction , bilaterally , hold weight either hand ( 1.4 kg patient weigh less 68.1 kg 2.3 kg patient weigh 68.1 kg ) . This test good reliability validity ( McClure , Tate et al . 2009 , Tate , McClure et al . 2009 ) . Neck range motion well active , passive accessory movement assess . Measurements obtain three time . First time , baseline patient interview record data collection sheet second one take completion 3 session treatment . The last measurement take end session . Patients assigned random allocation one 2 group use computer-generated sequence number independent therapist . The group : 1 ) Manual therapy ( MWM ) + tape ( postural correction scapular anterior tilt ) 2 ) Control ( conventional treatment + tape ( postural correction scapular anterior tilt ) group . The manual therapy intervention grade III mobilization movement , perform certify Mulligan practitioner , sit 6-10 repetition 3 set . Home exercise include cervical retraction , scapular retraction , deep neck flexor strengthen active range motion exercise neck direction do session home 10 second hold 10 repetition 5 time day add sequence group . When experimental group show significantly improve result , patient control group receive 2 extra session study measurement obtain . Frequency session carry 3 sessions/ week/ 30-60 minute ( Miller , Gross et al . 2010 ) . Manual Therapy Technique : The patient sit good relaxed posture therapist stand opposite side affect scapula . Reaching across trunk , palm leave hand clavicle right hand control scapular glide . Both hand apply corrective glide force ( grade III ) reposition scapula optimal position use adduction force along posterior external rotation scapula . While maintain position , subject ask move neck restrict movement point pain onset return start point . When technique indicate , patient able achieve considerably great range without pain . When need , modification humeral head repositioning could introduce . MWM repeat 6-10 time reassess movement independent scapular repositioning . If pain improve , 3 set 6-10 repetition carry . Taping technique correct anterior scapular tilt : A water-resistant active , elastic adhesive kinesiotape use I study . An I-shaped elastic tape apply muscle belly upper Trapezius ( UT ) . The tape start anchor fix anteriorly coracoid process travel posteriorly belly upper Trapezius fiber along course low fiber get final anchor thoracic spine .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 25 50 year . 2 . A history neck pain last 3 month prior study start . 3 . A score great equal 5/50 Neck Disability Index ( NDI ) ( Vernon 2008 , Vernon 2008 ) 4 . Presence scapular dyskinesia . 1 . Previous cervical spine shoulder surgery 2 . Cervical radiculopathy ( compressed cervical nerve root way spine , mainly could manifest pain , weakness , sensory deficit ( Corey Comeau 2014 ) 3 . Presence severe systemic disease ( fibromyalgia , Chronic fatigue syndrome , Diabetes mellitus , Hypertension , Grave 's disease , Systemic lupus erythematous , Rheumatoid arthritis , Sickle cell disease ) widespread musculoskeletal pain syndrome . 4 . Participation exercise program neck scapular muscle 6 month precede study . 5 . Consumption stimulant ( caffeine nicotine ) analgesic drug least 8 hour study . 6 . Manual therapy contraindication ( e.g. , inflammatory joint disease , spinal cord pathology , infection , severe osteoporosis , cancer ) . 7 . Whiplash injury/fracture .
